name: Magicians Crystal
description:
This game was originally supposed to be summited to the ScoreJam #17, but then Itch.io glitched and it didn't count my submissions.

The spiders want to destroy your magical crystal. You must defend your crystal from the spiders or you won't be able to use magic anymore!

Controls:

A, S, Left Arrow Key - Rotate Down

D, W, Right Arrow Key - Rotate Up

Shift - Sprint

Space - Use Spell
